thread.title: ANA’s new C-3PO jet is fluent in over 6 million forms of communication
thread.title_full: ANA’s new C-3PO jet is fluent in over 6 million forms of communication

author: Darrell Etherington
title: ANA’s new C-3PO jet is fluent in over 6 million forms of communication
text:
ANA’s new C-3PO jet is fluent in over 6 million forms of communication Posted Boom Supersonic raises $33M to build the fastest airplane for passenger flight 
Fancy paint jobs for airplanes are nothing novel, but few airlines ever really commit to making their jets look unique like Japan’s ANA. The air carrier’s latest custom craft is one of its Star Wars series of planes, commemorating everyone’s favorite golden protocol droid with a C-3PO yellow fuselage wrap, and interior decorating to match. 
The C-3PO ANA Jet follows R2-D2 and BB-8 variants released previously, and while those two were relatively easy to convey since a jet’s body is roughly equivalent to those droids lying on their sides, the humanoid C-3PO required a bit more creative license. A focus on that trademark midsection C-3PO enjoys, with its exposed wiring and large circular sternum detail, proved the most effective way to translate his essential droidness onto a gigantic passenger jet. 479a969551627278697513dc836a2b16
